1534.name: SP 312
1534.Applications: Ceweld SP 312 is a Chromium- Nickel alloy for use at operating temperatures up to 1020°C. It contains a high chromium content for good corrosion resistance and remarkable strength properties, especially under conditions of frequent switching or wide temperature fluctuations. Used for heating elements in domestic appliances and industrial equipment. Ceweld SP 312 can be applied with the flame spray process and the electric arc process as well.
1534.Suitable_For: Ceweld SP 312 is a Chromium- Nickel metal spray alloy for use at operating temperatures up to 1020°C. It contains a high chromium content for good corrosion resistance and remarkable strength properties, especially under conditions of frequent switching or wide temperature fluctuations. Used for heating elements in domestic appliances and industrial equipment.
